text: It's my honest review after using this cooler for one year. I live in the top floor of a building at Rangia in Assam. Room size is 14 by 13 feet. In a hot night of May or June I use 3 litres of cool fridge water and some ice cubes with normal water and towards the late night I need to take a blanket or to switch off it. Proper ventilation should be maintained. It consumes low electricity and also inverter friendly. Can go for it without any hesitation.
text_en: It's my honest review after using this cooler for one year. I live in the top floor of a building at Rangia in Assam. Room size is 14 by 13 feet. In a hot night of May or June I use 3 litres of cool fridge water and some ice cubes with normal water and towards the late night I need to take a blanket or to switch off it. Proper ventilation should be maintained. It consumes low electricity and also inverter friendly. Can go for it without any hesitation.
cleaned: honest review using cooler one year live top floor building rangia assam room size foot hot night may june use litre cool fridge water ice cube normal water towards late night need take blanket switch proper ventilation maintained consumes low electricity also inverter friendly without hesitation

text:
Our room is exactly 10x10 and we are two people. The room is well ventilated, so in this room, for 2 people, even for 3 people this cooler is enough. A stand to elevate its height can be better for cooler but we don't have, so we simply put the vents in the upward direction and it throws air to both of us. Air throw is definitely 9ft if not more. The water inlet is pretty wide and we use one full bucket water to fill directly and it doesn't pour out. U can even add ice into it. Separate ice chamber not there. Wheels are good. Cable is short -this issue is true with every cooler I guess. Water indicator level is good. Consumption is more I guess. 45litre is enough for 8hrs and then half and hour in afternoon but not more than that.

If u have keep it beside ur bed or workstation, and room is well ventilated...go for this. This cooler is very good for 2 3people sleeping on one bed or working in a room or even kitchen.

text: Just koolin-awesome... Perfect for small n medium rooms. Just put a big ice cube in the water from back panel and wallah feel the snowcrest like cool effect. But needed good ventilation of windows and doors or else humidity wil stick like salt on your skin. Minor side water leakage can be solved by pushing the upper side of honey comb slightly inside. Stand with wheels could have been a best option instead. Loved the product, the design, the plastic body, the air flow and the reasonable price.

text:
Bought this product on 6th May 2021. Flipkart delivered it on 10th May 2021. Product received 2 days before the scheduled delivery that too in lockdown period. Packaging was good and product came a brand new.
I was looking for a personal cooler and i must say hindware cooler does his job very nicely. Cooling is great at this size of cooler. Water tank is sufficient. All you need is to keep cooler in a room and create ventilation to enjoy best cooling experience. Look wise cooler is super cute and very easy to keep it because of its tiny size. Great product. Must recommend to buy this summer and enjoy cooling.
If it would have ice chamber too that would be an plus for this cooler but without ice chamber also it does its job very well.

text:
First week:
Enough sturdy, good fan and cooling capacity for small to medium sized rooms. Not for halls or large rooms. It says 45 litres but I think it's lesser thought of rating a star less for this but didn't do it as it serves the purpose.
Second week:
Leakage problem starts
No option to remove, replace, clean or adjust sides as the option to do so is not available, only rear side is detachable. Final verdict not recommended because of undetachable sides. A good product with major defect.
Third week:
Water leakage stopped automatically, but one drawback with is side pads are not detachable.
text_en:
First week:
Enough sturdy, good fan and cooling capacity for small to medium sized rooms. Not for halls or large rooms. It says 45 litres but I think it's lesser thought of rating a star less for this but didn't do it as it serves the purpose.
Second week:

No option to remove, replace, clean or adjust sides as the option to do so is not available, only rear side is detachable. Final verdict not recommended because of undetachable sides. A good product with major defect.
Third week:

text:
Hindware 45 L cooler is good and working well as of now.
got this cooler within a day of booking. cooling is good and cools 160 Sq FT area easily in 15 mins.. good for medium size room...
button knob should have markings or indicator for function selection and speed selection..
ice chamber should have been provided...
I m mostly using on speed 1 and still provides good air throw.. on high speed noise level also increases..
overall plastic quality is good.
hoping it would last long and less repair and maintenance is required..
satisfied with the product..

text:
For Overall build quality and material used - 1 Star
For Properly Water Distribution Design to spray over every honey comb equally used - 1 Star
For Maximum Tank which is of 45 Ltr water storage capacity when compared to other brands products have the same price range used - 1 Star
For Energy Efficient which is Power Consumption of - 105 W - 1 star
For compact size- 1 star.

Few Cons- Higher price of 6000. price should have lower to 5k. Bought it @5400 using credit card offer and even in low speed air throw/fan speed is high.
Overall it is okay in this price range.. can be used for small room and single person.

text: I have been using it for almost 4 months now. It is super silent, no disturbance in the sleep. Although it requires regularly cleanings after 20-25 days, otherwise water starts spilling out from the pads due to dirt and clogging as it do not have dust mesh outside like some other air coolers. Good air throw and the cooling is also good.

text:
Product build quality absolute best!! No 2nd thought, had not expected this budget friendly air cooler to be this Best.
Noise perspective Minimum because it uses fan not the blower.
Pump works good,
Opertatng knobs works great, touch n feel is also very good.
Then comes to Air throw, We have been using speed 1 and throws air upto 10 feet easily.so think of top speed.
And finally comes to performance wise cooling the air is good not great, don't expect too much from aircoolers in this hot summer..but as middle class we expect too much in minimum budget range..
So I suggest no turn around just go for it, it's absolute beast in its own range.
text_en:

So I suggest no turn around just go for it, it's absolute beast in its own range.
